18.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Adjusted argument list for ODHC01
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
03.06.2002 JJ SCR1349 reenabled debtor search w/o admin + cliennt added task
ApplyResltDEBCSearch
30.05.2002 JJ SCR1349 disabled debtor search button if ADMMO/CLNTNO are 0
07.05.2002 JJ SCR1211 added debtor search using ODHC01 search screen
18.04.2002 JJ SCR1117 cont. Added range on TPRL_HYPB_BATCHNO
15.04.2002 JJ SCR1117 replace update of pi.LineNo by update TPRL_HYPB_LINENO in
task WriteHYPB record (was causing a recompute, loosing al changes)
13.12.2001 JJ SCR#477 changed HYPB_DOCTYPE from 11 to 911
C,S: Cancel and OK both exit
On screen init with linked fields
Try to find a matching DEBC only if ADMNO and CLNTNO are entered
(else test fails automatically )
If more than one matching DEBC allow user to choose one
If entry not valid or user cancels selection, return to RM
(User has to change entry or cancel)
MsgBox(ID0003) Debtor not found
Entry checks out
For new records we obtain a new ID and create a Hyperarchiv Batch line
LineNo, if new, generate when writing HYPB, else use existing number
fetch last line within batch when creating new record
